cookie.title: We value your privacy
cookie.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Essential for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to deliver personalized advertisements and track campaign performance.

preference.title: Preference Cookies
preference.description: Remember your settings and preferences for a better experience.

consent.title: Consent Management
consent.noDataDescription: Unable to load your consent settings. Please try again later.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Essential for the website to function properly. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website to improve your experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to deliver personalized advertisements and track campaign performance.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Remember your settings and preferences for a better experience.

export.title: Export My Data
export.description: Download a copy of all your personal data stored in our system.
export.success: Data export requested successfully. You will be notified when it is ready.

delete.title: Delete My Account
delete.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data.
delete.success: Account deletion requested successfully. Your request will be processed within 30 days.

modal.title: Delete Account
modal.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone!
modal.warningDescription: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data, including bookings, preferences, and history.
modal.reasonPlaceholder: Help us improve by letting us know why you're leaving...

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.contactText: For questions about this policy, please contact

accept.title: Accept this Privacy Policy
accept.description: By accepting, you agree to our data collection and usage practices.
accept.accepted: You have accepted this privacy policy
